subject: Thoth font updated
msgSnippet: Hi group, The Thoth font has been updated. You can find this font in the  usual place (at least for now), in the files = fonts section on the yahoo webpage
messageBody:
Hi group,

The Thoth font has been updated. You can find this font in the usual
place (at least for now), in the files => fonts section on the yahoo
webpage for this mailing list.

I have added some kerning, so that some pairs of letters, which had a
bit too much space between them, now should fit right. In addition, I
changed the shape of Yo-yo. Several QS users noted that this letter
looked too much like the traditional orthography "P." I had to guess
what the shape should look like by looking at older fonts. If it needs
to change, let me know.

I think the font is ready for an official release, meaning I will upload
it to the open fonts library, if no one else thinks there is anything
major that needs improving. (I will continue to make small changes,
particularly fixing bad kerning.)

Paul

Hi group,

The Thoth font has been updated. You can find this font in the  usual 
place (at least for now), in the files => fonts section on the yahoo 
webpage for this mailing list.

I have added some kerning, so that some pairs of letters, which had a 
bit too much space between them, now should fit right. In addition, I 
changed the shape of Yo-yo. Several QS users noted that this letter 
looked too much like the traditional orthography "P." I had to guess 
what the shape should look like by looking at older fonts. If it needs 
to change, let me know.

I think the font is ready for an official release, meaning I will upload 
it to the open fonts library, if no one else thinks there is anything 
major that needs improving. (I will continue to make small changes, 
particularly fixing bad kerning.)

Paul
